com.ibm.jaggr.service.resource

Interface IResource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregationResource, StringResource

    public interface IResource
    Defines the interface for AMD module resources. Implementations can provide support for resources on the file system, in zip and jar files, or any other type of repository that can support this interface.

    Instances of IResource are created by an associated IResourceFactory object.

    Implementors of this interface also implement the IResourceVisitor.Resource interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IResourceVisitor.Resource asVisitorResource()
      This is a convenience method to return the current resource as a IResourceVisitor.Resource object.
      boolean exists()
      Returns true if the resource exists.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      Returns a InputStream object for the resource if the resource is not a directory/folder resource.
      Reader getReader()
      Returns a Reader object for the resource if the resource is not a directory/folder resource.
      URI getURI()
      Returns the URI for this resource.
      long lastModified()
      Returns the last-modified date of the resource.
      IResource resolve(String relative)
      Returns an IResource for the resource obtained by resolving the URI of this resource with the specified relative URI.
      void walkTree(IResourceVisitor visitor)
      Walks the folder tree rooted at the current resource, calling the IResourceVisitor.visitResource(IResourceVisitor.Resource, String) method for each resource or folder resource encountered.

    • Method Detail

      • getURI

        URI getURI()
        Returns the URI for this resource. Note that there is no requirement that the value returned be the same value that was provided to the IResourceFactory object used to create this instance.
        Returns:
        The resource URI

      • exists

        boolean exists()
        Returns true if the resource exists.
        Returns:
        True if the resource exists

      • lastModified

        long lastModified()
        Returns the last-modified date of the resource.
        Returns:
        The last-modified date

      • resolve

        IResource resolve(String relative)
        Returns an IResource for the resource obtained by resolving the URI of this resource with the specified relative URI. Use this method instead of calling URI.resolve(String) on the value returned by getURI() to ensure that the cached resource for the URI exists in the event that resource URIs are derived from a service such as URLConverter.toFileURL(java.net.URL).

      • getReader

        Reader getReader()
                 throws IOException
        Returns a Reader object for the resource if the resource is not a directory/folder resource.
        Returns:
        The resource reader
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource is a folder, or an I/O error occurred

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        Returns a InputStream object for the resource if the resource is not a directory/folder resource.
        Returns:
        The resource input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource is a folder, or an I/O error occurred

      • walkTree

        void walkTree(IResourceVisitor visitor)
              throws IOException
        Walks the folder tree rooted at the current resource, calling the IResourceVisitor.visitResource(IResourceVisitor.Resource, String) method for each resource or folder resource encountered.

        If this resource is not a folder, then visitor's IResourceVisitor.visitResource(IResourceVisitor.Resource, String) method is called once for this resource.

        Parameters:
        visitor - An instance of IResourceVisitor
        Throws:
        IOException

      • asVisitorResource

        IResourceVisitor.Resource asVisitorResource()
                                            throws IOException
        This is a convenience method to return the current resource as a IResourceVisitor.Resource object. This is useful for when you want to invoke a resource visitor for a resource that was obtained by means other than walkTree(IResourceVisitor). The resource must exist.
        Returns:
        An IResourceVisitor.Resource for current resource
        Throws:
        IOException - if the resource does not exist
